params._projects: A Projects contract which mints ERC-721's that represent project ownership and transfers.

set(uint256,uint256,uint256,(bool,uint16.details: Only the owner or operator of a project, or the current terminal of the project, can set its splits.The new splits must include any currently set splits that are locked.

params._domain: An identifier within which the splits should be considered active.
params._group: An identifier between of splits being set. All splits within this _group must add up to within 100%.
params._projectId: The ID of the project for which splits are being added.

params._domain: An identifier within which the returned splits should be considered active.
params._group: The identifying group of the splits.
params._projectId: The ID of the project to get splits for.

returns._0: An array of all splits for the project.

projects().notice: The Projects contract which mints ERC-721's that represent project ownership and transfers.

splitsOf(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Get all splits for the specified project ID, within the specified domain, for the specified group.
